ingredients: 4 cups mixed greens (lettuce, butter lettuce, or herbs like mint, cilantro, Thai basil)
8 oz oyster mushrooms, torn into strips (optional, can be saut√©ed or added raw)
1/2 head red cabbage, thinly sliced (optional, can be stir-fried or added raw)
steps: Start with a base of brown rice in each bowl
Add a handful of mixed greens, cucumber slices, and pickled vegetables
Top with meatballs or tofu cubes
Garnish with crushed peanuts, green onions, fresh mint, and cilantro
For meat version: Serve with nuoc cham sauce on the side or drizzled over the bowl
For tofu version: Drizzle with reserved tofu marinade/dressing (the 3/4 you set aside)
title: Bun Cha Bowl
